titleStmt.title: S. Pauls confession of faith, or, A brief account of his religion in a sermon preach'd at St. Warbroughs Church in Dublin, March 22, 1684/5 / by William Lord Bishop of Kilmore and Ardagh.
titleStmt.author: Sheridan, William, 1636-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Joseph Ray ... for William Norman ...,

notesStmt.note: "Preface to the reader" [in the form of two letters to the author] signed: A. Midensis [and] W. King.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
